creator: mak-apache-bugzilla@greenhills.co.uk
text:
The struts URL in BUILDING.txt (cvs'ed today) step 17 is slightly wrong,
see appended patch.

Also, step 23 tells you to modify build.properties, where you find
jakarta-tomcat-connector.home, which is not mentioned in BUILDING.txt;
it could do with either mentioning in BUILDING.txt, or a comment in
build.properties explaining that this is optional.

Index: BUILDING.txt
===================================================================
RCS file: /home/cvspublic/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/BUILDING.txt,v
retrieving revision 1.14
diff -u -r1.14 BUILDING.txt
--- BUILDING.txt        2001/11/06 21:52:14     1.14
+++ BUILDING.txt        2001/11/27 16:36:51
@@ -269,7 +269,7 @@
 
 * Download a binary distribution of Struts 1.0 from:
 
-    http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-struts/release/1.0/
+    http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-struts/release/v1.0/
 
   On a Windows platform, you will need:
     jakarta-struts-1.0.zip
